featuredPost.title: Who Is the Ideal Candidate for TED Hair Restoration?
featuredPost.intro: If you’ve been noticing thinning hair or shedding, this innovative, pain-free hair loss treatment might be for you. Designed for both men and women experiencing thinning hair, TED provides results without the need for surgery, medications, or downtime.

blogPosts.title: Breaking the Stigma of Aesthetic Treatments
blogPosts.author: Lushful Team
blogPosts.intro: The idea that cosmetic procedures are just for women is outdated. At Lushful Aesthetics, we help men challenge beauty standards and embrace non-invasive self-care, from Botox to Scrotox, with confidence.

blogPosts.title: TED Hair Restoration After Hair Transplants
blogPosts.author: Lushful Team
blogPosts.intro: Hair transplants restore hair in thinning areas, but ongoing care is essential to protect the hair you still have. With the help of TED, a non-surgical treatment, patients can sustain hair density, strengthen follicles, and maximize effectiveness.

blogPosts.title: Radiesse vs. Sculptra: Choosing the Best Filler for a Chiseled Jawline
blogPosts.author: Lushful Team
blogPosts.intro: Sharper jawline? Radiesse or Sculptra? This blog dives into these dermal fillers to help you choose the best one for your sculpted look, considering factors like immediate results, longevity, and sculpted definition.

article.raw:
{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"A sharp, well-defined jawline enhances facial symmetry and gives you a strong, youthful appearance. While several options are available, Radiesse and Sculptra stand out for their unique properties and effectiveness. Understanding the differences and benefits of each will help you make an informed decision for your aesthetic goals.
","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"What is Radiesse?","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://radiesse.com/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Radiesse","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":" is a dermal filler known for its effectiveness and longevity, making it ideal for jawline contouring. It is made from Calcium Hydroxylapatite (CaHA) microspheres suspended in a gel carrier. This provides immediate volume and stimulates collagen production, offering long-term benefits that can last up to five years.
","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"What is Sculptra?","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.sculptrausa.com/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Sculptra","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":", on the other hand, is a poly-L-lactic acid (PLLA) based filler. Unlike Radiesse, Sculptra does not provide immediate results but works gradually to stimulate collagen production. This makes it more suited for subtle volume enhancement over larger areas, rather than precise contouring.
","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Benefits of Radiesse Jawline Fillers","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"unordered-list","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Immediate and Long-Lasting Results:","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" Jawline Radiesse fillers provide immediate definition and stimulate natural collagen production, enhancing the jawline’s shape over a prolonged period.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Precision in Application:","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" Its thick consistency allows for targeted application, which is crucial for the angular, defined contours desired in jawline enhancements.
","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Benefits of Sculptra Jawline Fillers","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"unordered-list","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Gradual Improvements:","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" Jawline Sculptra fillers are ideal for those who prefer gradual changes that accumulate over time, enhancing facial volume without drastic immediate change.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Longevity:","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" Although it takes longer to see the full effects, Sculptra results can last more than two years once the desired volume is achieved.
","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Choosing the Right Filler for Your Needs","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"When deciding between Radiesse and Sculptra, it's important to consider your specific aesthetic goals and treatment expectations. blogPosts.title: The Golden Ratio – The Beauty Scale for Facial Aesthetics
blogPosts.author: Lushful Team
blogPosts.intro: Learn how to understand the golden ratio of beauty with NYC’s Lushful Aesthetics, and how cosmetic doctors use the mathematical symmetry of the golden ratio to create a face that is aesthetically harmonious with fillers and more.

article.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"What is the Golden Ratio?","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"How do we define beauty? Symmetrical balance and ideal facial proportions are one way we have defined it over the years, and it has helped us to understand how we can create a cosmetic change that strives for beauty and a sense of aesthetic completeness. The Golden Ratio of Beauty states that when a line is divided into two parts in a ratio of 1: 1.618. The result is what we have considered the ideal portion for thousands of years. From visual art to architecture and beyond, the golden ratio has been used as the standard, and the closest thing that we have come to perfection in all realms of aesthetics, and the human body is no different when trying to quantify balanced beauty aesthetics. \n","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"How does the Beauty Scale for Facial Aesthetics use the Golden Ratio? ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Facial sculpting ranges from patient to patient, and the golden ratio standards help as a guide for potential aesthetic goals. While an Aesthetic Injector will have the knowledge and instinct to how one might create a more symmetrical face, the golden ratio allows them to use mathematical precision to create a face that is aesthetically harmonious:","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"unordered-list","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"An aesthetically balanced face is 1.618 times longer than it is wide. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The distance from the top of the nose to the center of the lips is 1.618 times the distance from the center of the lips to the chin. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The hairline of the upper eyelid should be 1.618 times the length of the top of the upper eyebrow to the lower eyelid. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The golden ratio of lips in volume is 1:1.6, with the lower lip supposed to have slightly more volume than the upper lip. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The length of an ear should be the same length as the nose. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The width of an eye should be the same as the distance between the eyes. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Of course, this definition of balanced beauty aesthetics is not a rule. Since beauty is a subjective and man-made idea, the golden ratio of beauty is just a set of measurements one can use as a guideline to create a more harmonious and balanced face. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"As a template, the golden ratio face test can be used to help restore facial harmony and balance, not to measure facial beauty. This helps especially for aging patients, because as we age, the distance between the mouth and the nose, and the width of the mouth and the nose have a habit of expanding. This means that with time, some faces that had ideal factual proportions before might deviate from golden ratio standards. \n","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"How Does Lushful Aesthetics Use the Perfect Face Ratio? ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"At Lushful Aesthetics the golden ratio of beauty is just a guideline. During your consultation, ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.lushfulaesthetics.com/about"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Chris Bustamante, DNP, NP-C","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":", focuses on your unique anatomy and facial aesthetic goals. blogPosts.title: How to Prepare for Botox
blogPosts.author: Lushful Team
blogPosts.intro: Perfect for first-time botox users and experienced facial or body botox users alike, botox prep requires just a few easy steps to make your experience at the MedSpa more pleasant along with reducing post-botox swelling.

article.raw:
{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The Basics of Botox & Filler.","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Getting ready for botox and filler on any part of your body can be done in a couple of simple steps. Even if you are a first-time botox user, it’s important to remember that botox and fillers are safe, effective, and FDA-approved. Millions of people have used botox and fillers to get a more youthful look that has long-lasting and enduring results.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"What Medications Don’t Mix Well With Botox & Fillers?","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Before you do anything else on botox prep, talk to your doctor about what medications you are on, such as some blood-thinning medications, which can make you more prone to bruising. These blood-thinning medications can include aspirin, painkillers like ibuprofen or Advil, and more. It is highly recommended to stop taking these medications two weeks prior to your botox and filler treatment, but even just a few days in advance is helpful to minimize bruising. The reason why you should not take any of these blood-thinning medications is because of bruising or swelling that can occur during post-botox care. While bruising and swelling are completely normal side effects of botox, blood-thinning medications can actually make these symptoms worse. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"How to Prevent Bruising From Fillers and Botox Prep.","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Even if you cannot completely prevent bruising during botox recovery, there are some techniques when you learn how to prep for botox to prevent extensive bruising and swelling. It first starts with making sure you’re well-hydrated and eating a proper meal before your treatment. 

Make sure to eliminate alcohol before–and after–botox treatment. Alcohol is a vasodilator and will cause your blood vessels to relax, which means you will be more prone to bruising and swelling in the treated area. Even a single shot or a casual glass of wine can trigger this effect, so stay away from any alcoholic beverages for 24 hours before and after your botox and filler treatment. 

In a similar fashion, you should avoid working out for 48 hours after you have received your botox injections, giving your body enough time to recover. An increased heart rate will help create blood flow, and therefore can help trigger swelling and bruising. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"While Lushful Aesthetics doesn’t recommend immediately using an ice-pack post procedure (as this is a source for potential infection). Icing the next day can be helpful for easing any mild bruising that may occur.

Patients should avoid arriving at their appointment with heavy makeup on. This will all need to be removed to prevent contamination of the treated areas. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"What Botox and Fillers Treatment Should You Choose? ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"If you are a first-time botox user or just recently moved to NYC, botox and fillers should be a comfortable and pleasant experience. blogPosts.title: Getting a Chiseled Jawline
blogPosts.author: Lushful Team
blogPosts.intro: There are ways for men to get a chiseled jawline. Creating a square chin and a sharp jawline can help you create a more overall symmetrical face. In addition, there are  facial workouts and diets, which can further define your jawline.

article.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"5 Ways to Get a Better Jawline","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Have you always wanted to have a more chiseled, masculine jawline, but feel that it’s just not possible? There are many myths about how to fix your side profile without surgery, and the reality is that there are ways for males to get a chiseled jawline. The strong jawline is associated with many classic masculine features, such as having an assertive personality and being successful. Creating a square chin and a sharp jawline can help you create a more overall symmetrical face, and from workouts to look more masculine to diets that can help you lose face fat, there are ways to develop a stronger jawline. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"\n","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"Jaw Exercises ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The first step in reshaping your jawline, jaw exercises for the jawline may help you reshape your facial structure and help create a more symmetrical face, along with following the other steps below:","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Neck Curl-Ups","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Similar to an abdominal curl, you lift your head about two inches off the ground and bring your chin to your chest. Try to avoid lifting your chin or your stomach. Work with three sets of ten repetitions. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Vowel Notes ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"This exercise focuses on the muscles around the mouth, by opening your mouth wide as possible and saying the vowels of the alphabet. Try to make sure your tongue does not touch your teeth to make the workout more intense. Do three sets of fifteen repetitions.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Chin Slide ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Helping to work the muscles underneath the chin, you should place your palm under the chin, and pull your bottom jaw down as far as possible with your mouth shut then use the palm to apply pressure as you move your hand along your double chin, jawline, and side of the face until you reach your temples. Perform this exercise ten times (5 times on each side)","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Working Out ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"While jaw exercises for the jawline can help, in general working out and losing weight will help you look more masculine and may get you to regrow a sharper jawline. Even if you do not have a strong jawline, working out may help you lose facial fat, and by increasing blood circulation you can come away with a healthy glow.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Getting a Good Night of Rest ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Along with working out, another way to lose weight, and look all around healthier is by getting at least eight hours of continuous sleep every night. Sleep helps both the body and the brain, helping your mind maintain the neural pathways in your brain, and can even help you burn fat and lose weight. People who get a full night's rest ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.healthline.com/nutrition/sleep-and-weight-loss#:~:text=Getting%20enough%20sleep%20may%20help%20prevent%20increases%20in%20calorie%20intake,intake%20(%2016%20%2C%2017%20)."},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"have been shown","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":" to have less of an appetite and less of a daily caloric intake, and even burn fat and repair the body after working out. Learning how to get a sharp jawline isn’t only about focusing on the jawline, it’s about readjusting certain aspects of your life so you can be healthier and happier. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Grow Out Your Beard ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"If you have the ability, being able to grow out and shape your beard is a perfect way to help create a more symmetrical and masculine face. ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://otisskincare.com/blogs/news/beard-strong-jawline#:~:text=A%20beautifully%20shaped%20beard%20has,trim%20and%20shape%20it%20expertly."},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Learning how a beard","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":" can give you that chiseled jawline appearance is about understanding your beard’s strength and structure, and making sure to keep it well-groomed and moisturized. \n","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Reduce Salt in Your Diet ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Another way to keep your jawline, and your facial structure, stronger and sharper, is by making sure your face isn’t bloated. The sodium in salt pulls water into your blood vessels, resulting in enlarged vessels, and therefore a swollen face, ankles, or even legs. When learning how to get a more masculine face, consider reducing the amount of sodium in your diet to about 2,000 milligrams, which is a little less than a teaspoon of salt. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"What Medical Treatments Fix Your Side Profile Without Surgery?","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"There are a variety of ways one might learn to get a sharp jawline and a square chin, but not all of them will work. Lushful Aesthetic’s facial botox injections are performed by Chris Bustamante, DNP, NP-C (@InjectorChris) for both facial and body botox procedures. As a leading aesthetic clinic for men in NYC that is LGBTQ and BIPOC owned, our Aesthetic Clinic’s goal is to create a comfortable space for all, helping to soften facial appearances for those who want to prevent frown lines, a furrowed brow, and more. Facial botox injections can also treat TMJ pain associated with teeth grinding and for masseter muscle reduction.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

featuredServices.beforeAfterServiceDescription: View our transformative Botox results at Lushful Aesthetics, our expert treatments ensure a natural, refreshed appearance without the undesired frozen look. Whether it's your first visit or a follow-up for touch-ups, our personalized assessment ensures you receive the precise units needed for your desired outcome. At Lushful Aesthetics, we prioritize a look that enhances your natural features. We offer an individualized approach to prevent and treat fine lines and wrinkles, ensuring your satisfaction every time you look in the mirror.

intro.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Injectable fillers for jawline contouring provide definition and structure, resulting in a more chiseled jawline. At Lushful Aesthetics in NYC, we enhance your natural contours with jawline fillers that add volume and redefine the angles of your face. Our expert practitioners tailor treatments to suit individual needs, ensuring that each client achieves their desired aesthetic","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"\nThe Benefits of Jawline Contouring: ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Jawline contouring creates more of a pronounced and aesthetically pleasing jawline. This procedure provides a clear, defined contour that enhances the natural beauty of your face.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Jawline fillers help achieve a better balance of facial features, making the face appear more symmetrical and aligned. This can significantly improve how other features, such as the eyes and cheeks, are perceived.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Jawline contouring enhances the visual appeal and adds definition to the lower face. A well-defined jawline can make a face look younger and more firm, reducing the appearance of jowls and sagging skin","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

ourApproach.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Jawline filler is one of Lushful Aesthetics' most popular procedures and is one of the more common aesthetic clinic services, focusing on creating more of a chiseled jawline. This is done with a nonsurgical jawline contouring procedure utilizing Radiesse®, which lasts 3 years. Radiesse filler is the superior option for jawlines since it is a firmer product that has a bio-stimulator effect, which creates long-lasting collagen and elastin. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"\nMen typically require between 5-7 syringes to create a defined jawline. Women may only require 3-4 syringes. Aesthetic clinic patients need to understand that the jawline is a large area, and achieving a truly chiseled result requires a substantial amount of jawline filler. Smaller amounts can be used, but patients are advised that they will likely only see a minimal improvement in jawline structure. Our jawline filler procedure often includes the chin to maintain facial harmonization. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

intro.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Alma TED (TransEpidermal Delivery) is a revolutionary, non-invasive hair growth aesthetic clinic treatment for hair loss, hair shedding, and hair thinning. The Alma TED hair treatment utilizes an ultrasound-based system that releases sound waves and air pressure to optimize the penetration of a powerful topical hair growth formula into the scalp. The benefits of this hair restoration machine vary from individual to individual: ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"No needles, anesthesia, or incisions","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Painless","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Thicker, healthier hair","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"No downtime or recovery ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Stronger hair follicles ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The hair restoration machine is designed to promote and increase blood flow, optimize scalp health, and stimulate hair follicles to produce thicker, stronger, and healthier hair. The topical formula utilized during the TED hair restoration procedure contains exponentially more peptides and growth factors than patient-derived PRP. Therefore the aesthetic clinic results experienced from the TED hair restoration device are far superior than PRP for hair restoration results.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

ourApproach.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"When the Alma TED hair restoration device is utilized in conjunction with the peptide and growth factor topical serum, it promotes increased blood flow to the scalp and delivers the peptides and growth factors directly to the hair follicle to promote healthier, thicker, and stronger head of hair during a hair regrowth treatment that takes about 15-20 minutes. The Alma TED hair restoration device delivers optimal results without the discomfort affiliated with PRP hair restoration which requires various injections that are quite painful. The ultrasound hair growth treatment is a completely painless and quick procedure.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

preCare.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Wash hair and do NOT apply any leave-in hair products prior to your appointment. This includes hair gels, balms, leave-in conditioners, etc. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The scalp must be healthy and not have any active skin conditions such as psoriasis, eczema, fungal infections, etc. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

featuredPost.title: Hormonal Imbalance and Low Libido
featuredPost.author: Lushful Team
featuredPost.intro: Low libido might be more than stress. It can mean a hormonal imbalance. Learn the research-backed signs, testing options, and expert treatments available.

article.raw:
{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Hormonal Imbalance and Low Libido: How to Spot the Signs Early ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-1"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Low libido affects relationships, confidence, and vitality. While stress or lifestyle can play a role, low hormone levels frequently lie at the root. This guide draws on clinical research to help you detect hormonal imbalances early and discover proven treatments at Lushful Aesthetics. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"What is Hormonal Imbalance? How Does It Affect You?","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"A hormonal imbalance occurs when your body produces too much or too little of key hormones, such as testosterone or estrogen. Testosterone is the primary male hormone, as it influences not only libido but also mood, energy, muscle mass, and cognition. Stable testosterone is essential, and while everyone experiences fluctuations in their hormones across the course of their lives, stabilizing your hormones can help keep your body in check.

low levels often mean strength and composition changes. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Sleep disturbances: ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Hormonal fluctuations can disrupt sleep, further suppressing testosterone. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Performance anxiety: ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Anxiety or ED may stem partly from hormonal shifts. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"If you experience several of these symptoms alongside low libido and/or ED, you could have a hormonal imbalance.

blogPosts.title: The Myths of Jelqing to Increase Penis Size
blogPosts.author: Lushful Team
blogPosts.intro: If you've ever looked up “how to increase penis size”, chances are you've come across jelqing—a controversial penis stretching technique. But is this penis elongation exercise safe? And more importantly—is there medical evidence proving that it works?

Promoted online as a natural penis increase exercise, jelqing involves repeated manual strokes intended to boost both girth and length. But is this penis elongation exercise safe? And more importantly—is there medical evidence proving that jelqing works? While some claim to see jelqing results, medical experts say otherwise, with a heavy warning on the potential side effects from penis stretching. In this article, we’ll break down what jelqing is, examine the science behind it, highlight the dangers, and explore safer, medically supported alternatives for those seeking real enhancement.

While there are no exact, scientifically proven ways to show that jelqing works, usually people will utilize an unscented lubricant such as lotion, and will wrap their index finger and thumb in a circle around the base of your penis. The pressure on your penis should be just tight enough to be felt, but should not be tight, as this can result in injuries and other jelqing side effects, as we discuss in the next paragraph. Then, you should repeatedly slide your fingers from the base of your penis to your head. The penis stretching technique involves pulling with pressure up the shaft. Proper penis elongation exercises such as the jelqing technique should be done daily, for five to twenty minutes daily.

blogPosts.intro: Here’s the thing about penis size: it isn’t nearly as important as people think. Studies show that most partners care more about connection and confidence than measurements. In this blog, we’ll break down the facts and help put those size worries to rest.

The truth is, the average erect penis length is around 5 to 5.5 inches, with a circumference of about 4.5 inches. Flaccid size varies even more, usually around 3.6 inches long. But here’s the thing: size isn’t nearly as important as people think. Studies show that most partners care more about connection and confidence than measurements. In this blog, we’ll break down the facts and help put those size worries to rest.

blogPosts.title: Anal Dilation
blogPosts.author: Lushful Team
blogPosts.intro: This guide on anal dilators will provide an overview of common anal dilation techniques, their uses, and best practices for safe and effective anal dilation.

blogPosts.metaTitle: What to Know - Anal Dilators for Bottoming and Anal Stretching
blogPosts.metaDescription: Whether it's for pleasure or medical reasons, anal dilators, otherwise known as anal stretchers, can help for bottoming and to prevent anal pain such as fissures.

blogPosts.title: Myth of Penis Pills
blogPosts.author: Lushful Team
blogPosts.intro: We've all heard of miracle pills that can make your penis grow, but what do penis supplements actually achieve? Explore pills for penile enhancement and safe alternatives to enhance your penis aesthetically.

blogPosts.title: Myths About Increasing Penis Size With Hormones
blogPosts.author: Lushful Team
blogPosts.intro: Feeling insecure about the size of your genitals? This is a natural feeling for many around the world, and because of this, there are many “medical experts” who claim to have a cure-all, but are their claims medically proven to work?

article.raw:
{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Have you been curious about how one can increase the size of their genitals? This is a natural feeling for many around the world, and because of this, there are many “medical experts” who claim to have a cure-all, but are their claims medically proven to work? Testosterone, HCG, and peptides are just three of the many cure-alls doctors have claimed to use to increase penis size permanently as hormones for penile growth. We’re going to break down these three and see what they do to the body. Are there any real ways to increase your size that are safe and effective? Just read more to find out.

This means it is the prime resource to help you develop male reproductive tissues (such as the genitals) and secondary sexual characteristics, such as muscle mass, bone density, and even body hair. This means that during puberty, testosterone is essential for your body to function and develop properly into an adult fully. 
","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Does Testosterone Affect Genital Size? ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Because testosterone is essential to growing throughout puberty, some medical professionals will consider this proof that testosterone can be used as a penis growth hormone, but this is misleading. Many non-surgical cosmetic treatments utilize collagen to help boost the strength and health of your skin in the long run.

blogPosts.title: The Risks and Reasons to Avoid Permanent Filler for Penis Augmentation
blogPosts.author: Lushful Team
blogPosts.intro: Permanent penile enlargement is a hot topic among the patients seeking to enlarge their penis. However, permanent results don't always lead to satisfied patients. Review the risks before making a permanent decision.

article.raw:
{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Using permanent fillers to increase your penile girth sounds like a good idea when researching penis augmentations. While a permanent solution may seem attractive, it's crucial to consider the potential risks and reasons why someone might want to avoid permanent filler for penis augmentation. 
","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Limited Reversibility and Changing Expectations","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"One of the most significant drawbacks of permanent penis fillers is their limited reversibility. Unlike temporary fillers, which can be adjusted or dissolved, permanent fillers like Bellafill are designed to provide lasting results. If you're dissatisfied with the outcome or experience complications, it can be challenging, if not impossible, to undo the effects. Desires and expectations regarding penis size can change over time. What may seem like the right choice today might not be the case in the future. Permanent filler locks you into a specific size, which could become an issue if your size preferences change.
","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Health Risks","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Permanent fillers, like any medical procedure, carry inherent risks that may result in the need for ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.lushfulaesthetics.com/sexual-enhancement-services/penis-filler-revision/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"correcting botched penile filler","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":". These may include infection, allergic reactions, tissue damage, and other complications. There have been cases of serious infections and deformities associated with permanent penis fillers, underscoring the importance of thorough risk assessment. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Numerous studies on the efficacy and safety of temporary and permanent fillers in human tissues have been conducted; however, it should be noted that these studies generally last for 1-2 years. There have been few studies on the long-term effects of dermal fillers. The benefit of utilizing a temporary filler is that your body can naturally degrade and excrete the materials they are composed of. 
","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"What is Bellafill made of?","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Bellafill is composed of non-resorbable polymethylmethacrylate (PMMA) suspended in collagen. PMMA is a synthetic polymer commonly called acrylic, a transparent and rigid plastic. The collagen provides immediate volume and lift while the PMMA remains in place and stimulates the body's own collagen production over time. Bellafill is used as a dermal filler in other cosmetic procedures such as smoothing smile lines and treating acne scars. 
","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Is Bellafill safe?","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Bellafill for girth enhancement ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://bellafill.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/Bellafill_IFU.pdf"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"has been tested for safety","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":", however, we don’t know the long-term effects of PMMA injected into tissues. One could argue that in 25 years we could discover that hyaluronic acid or calcium based fillers are harmful, but those fillers can either naturally break down, or be dissolved. Bellafill penis filler may not be easily removable. The traumatic scarring from surgical removal can be seen in patients who experienced adverse reactions to silicone injections years after their initial treatments. When considering penile augmentation with permanent fillers, patients should do a thorough risk assessment with their Medical Provider to discuss the pros and cons of the fillers being used.
","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Results and Expertise","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Regardless of what filler a patient chooses, they should seek a Medical Provider with the expertise and experience in penile augmentation. Achieving even results is not always guaranteed, no matter how experienced the provider is. Over time, the filler material may shift or clump, leading to an uneven or undesirable appearance. In the case of patients who have been treated with hyaluronic acid or calcium based fillers, the correction process is fairly simple. These temporary fillers can be dissolved or manipulated to correct any migration or nodule formation. With Bellafill penis filler, correction of undesirable results is nearly impossible. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Not all medical practitioners are experienced in performing permanent penis filler procedures for penile augmentation. Finding a skilled, qualified, and reputable practitioner can be a challenge, and choosing the wrong provider can increase the likelihood of complications and undesirable outcomes. When choosing a provider it is important to ask thorough questions, ask for before and after photos, and read patient reviews.

Chris’ preferred method of penile augmentation with filler is to utilize a blend of hyaluronic acid and calcium based fillers to provide a long-lasting, but safe and natural result. Bellafill for girth enhancement has appeal as a permanent filler, but injecting plastic into the penis has many risks and can lead to an unnatural result that is unfortunately irreversible. This condition is characterized by a decrease in the size of one or both testicles and can stem from various causes, including hormone therapy. The symptoms of testicular atrophy go beyond just a change in size. They can include reduced sex drive and erectile dysfunction as the testicles produce less testosterone. This can also lead to infertility as the testicles are where sperm are produced and atrophy can cause a drop in sperm count. All of these issues can lead to problems with self-esteem and romantic relationships that can culminate in anxiety and depression.

This happens because the therapy can signal the body to reduce its own testosterone production, which in turn affects the size of the testicles. While testosterone therapy offers numerous benefits, this side effect is a consideration for those contemplating testosterone therapy and should be monitored by those undergoing the treatment.
","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Will Testicles Return to Size After Stopping Testosterone?","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The testicles can regain some size after stopping testosterone therapy, but it's not guaranteed, and the extent of size recovery can vary widely among individuals. blogPosts.title: The Science Behind Shockwave Therapy
blogPosts.author: Lushful Team
blogPosts.intro: As a well-known medical treatment, focused shockwave therapy has been shown to help erectile dysfunction and promote stronger erections. We go through how shockwave therapy works, and its benefits.

article.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Shockwave therapy for the penis is a well-known medical treatment that has been around for many years and has multiple indications, including helping those suffering from erectile dysfunction. Even if you do not suffer from ED, shockwave physical therapy for your penis  helps to stimulate blood flow throughout the genitals, resulting in stronger and longer-lasting erections to help you have a more enjoyable time in the bedroom. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"What is Shockwave Therapy? What is it Used For Outside of Treating ED?","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The clinical term for shockwave physical therapy is low-intensity shockwave therapy (LiSWT). This noninvasive physical therapy is often utilized in  orthopedics to facilitate the healing of broken bones, injured ligaments, and injured tendons. It also can be utilized to improve wound healing, speed up tissue repair, and encourage healthy cell growth. This cellular and tissue repair is achieved by increasing the blood flow to the treated area, which delivers your own body's healing properties to the injured area.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"What Equipment Does Shockwave Physical Therapy Use? ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Shockwave therapy uses a wand-like device to administer the LiSWT in different areas. The time period of this treatment can vary, depending on the focus point. For penile shockwave therapy, a healthcare professional usually moves the device along parts of your penis for about fifteen minutes to deliver the optimal amount of shocks necessary. No anesthetics are needed during this process, which delivers a gentle pulse to the area of interest. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The two main types of Shockwave devices marketed are Focused Shockwave devices and Radial Shockwave devices. Focused and Radial Shockwave Therapy differ not only in their properties and mode of generation, but also in terms of the magnitude of the standard parameters (pressure amplitude, pulse duration, and  impact). Studies have shown that Focused Shockwave Therapy achieves the deepest therapeutic tissue penetration for the most optimal results.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"There can be a wide range of ways to treat ED with shockwave therapy and on average, treatment plans require weekly treatments for six weeks or two treatments a week for three weeks.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Studies on Why Shockwave Therapy for ED Works","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Over the past ten years or so, there has been extensive evidence proving that the results of penile shockwave therapy can help those with erectile dysfunction. ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://www.nature.com/articles/s41443-019-0117-z?utm_medium=affiliate&utm_source=commission_junction&utm_campaign=CONR_PF018_ECOM_GL_PHSS_ALWYS_DEEPLINK&utm_content=textlink&utm_term=PID100090071&CJEVENT=7e705c98e5f811ed83d557a90a82b82a"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"value":"Clinical meta-analysis of studies from 2019","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" shows that low-intensity shockwave therapy was able to significantly improve erectile function.  ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"But studies of how LiSWT can treat ED have been occurring for some time, one such ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://www.europeanurology.com/article/S0302-2838(10)00304-0/fulltext"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"value":"pilot study from 2010","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" draws similar conclusions. This study looked at twenty men who had vasculogenic ED and involved a six-month follow-up, at which point the men had no adverse side effects. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Where in NYC is Penile Shockwave Therapy Available? ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Lushful Aesthetics, one of NYC’s leading LGBTQ+ MedSpas, offers ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://www.lushfulaesthetics.com/sexual-enhancement-services/shockwave-therapy/"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"value":"Focused Shockwave Therapy,","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" which is intended to promote harder and fuller erections, helping to improve men’s erectile health for both those who do and do not suffer from erectile dysfunction.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Along with LiSWT, Lushful Aesthetics  offers the P-Shot®, which is an injection of high-density platelet-rich plasma (HD PRP) into the penis to deliver your own bodies stem cells and growth factors directly to your erectile tissue. The patient is also provided a medical grade vacuum pump for at home therapy in order to achieve optimal results. This combined therapy helps to promote stronger erections. ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://www.lushfulaesthetics.com/contact/"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"value":"Contact Lushful Aesthetics","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" today and we will be more than happy to help you address your sexual enhancement concerns. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

blogPosts.title: Penile Lengthening Surgery. Is It Worth It?
blogPosts.author: Lushful Team
blogPosts.intro: Men have shown increasing interest in addressing their aesthetics. Penile lengthening surgery is one procedure that draws attention. This surgical option is surrounded by misconceptions and a hefty price tag. Which should make one consider, is it worth it?

article.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The Basics of Penile Lengthening Surgery: What is it?","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Penile lengthening surgery, also known as phalloplasty, is a surgical procedure designed to enhance the length of the penis. It's important to note that this surgery is purely elective and falls under the category of cosmetic procedures, rather than being medically necessary. And therefore is not covered by insurance. The primary goal of penile lengthening surgery is to address individuals' concerns about their self-image, self-esteem, and overall satisfaction with their genital appearance. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"There are a wide variety of approaches that are used for penis enlargement surgery, each one featuring their own side effects and a variety of recovery times. Some surgery involves the insertion of silicone implants, while others use the transfer of fat cells or the use of skin grafts. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"How Does Permanent Penile Enlargement Surgery Work?","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The primary surgical technique used to increase penile length is Ligament Release. It involves the release of the suspensory ligament that anchors the penis to the pubic bone. By severing this ligament, a portion of the penile shaft that was previously concealed within the body can be exposed, resulting in a slight increase in visible length when the penis is flaccid - though no more than about an inch.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Managing Expectations of Male Enhancement Procedures ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"It's crucial to have realistic expectations about the outcomes of permanent penile enhancement. While some increase in length can be achieved, the results may not be as dramatic as some individuals hope for. More importantly, the length increase from this procedure is seen mostly in the flaccid penis state. The erect length of the penis does not change significantly and the penis typically will point down when erect once the ligament is cut since the ligament is responsible for keeping the penis up when erect. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Risks Associated with Penis Enlargement Surgery ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"There are also several risks to consider. As with all surgical procedures, risks include the potential for infection, scarring, anesthesia complications, and the need for future revision. The risks with this specific procedure include nerve damage and lack of penile support during erection which can cause erectile dysfunction.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"While a more recent study in 2019 suggested that a male enhancement procedure, statistically, is becoming more safer for patients. Those who believe that the benefits of this procedure outweigh the risks should be prepared for a long, uncomfortable recovery period. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The average recovery time for this procedure is around 4 months. The ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.nature.com/articles/s41598-019-41652-w"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"expert recommendation","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":" is that you should refrain from intense physical activities for about one month, or 30 days, and 60 days of no sexual activity or masturbation after your penile augmentation surgery. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"What Non-Surgical Options Exist","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"For men that desire an increase in the flaccid length of their penis, Botox is an excellent non-surgical alternative to penis enlargement surgery. The use of Penile Botox along the shaft helps to relax the muscle that causes the penis to shrink when flaccid. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The procedure only requires topical numbing and a few quick injections along each side of the penis, and these pros well outweigh the cons of permanent penile enlargement. blogPosts.title: Pros and Cons of Surgical vs. Non-Surgical BBLs
blogPosts.author: Lushful Team
blogPosts.intro: If you are nervous about a more traditional BBL, let us introduce you to an alternative: a no-scalpel Brazilian Lift, surgery-free. This type of BBL treatment can be safer for the body and more affordable. Curious about this NYC butt lift?

article.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"What is the Difference between Butt Injections vs. BBL? ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"If you are thinking about growing a bigger butt, but are a little concerned or confused about the procedure, price point, and healing process of a surgical butt lift, it’s important to know about the alternatives to a traditional BBL. A non-invasive BBL still results in a more rounded, lifted, and attractive butt, though the results are not as drastic as a traditional BBL surgery. \n","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"What are Dermal Fillers for Non-Surgical BBLs Made From?","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Usually, nonsurgical butt lifts are usually either treated with hyperdiluted Radiesse® or Sculptura®. Hyperdiluted Radiesse is a solution of the semi permanent filler, Radesse, that has been diluted with saline. This solution is strategically injected into certain areas of the buttocks to increase volume and to potentially address sagging or wrinkled skin. The Radiesse helps to stimulate the building of new collagen in the body. New collagen is there to provide structure, strength, and support throughout the buttocks area.  ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"These small doses of Radiesse are safe if done by a medical professional. Hyperdiluted Radiesse used for a no-scalpel Brazilian Lift has the potential to treat a variety of skin imperfections, including skin laxity and even cellulite with minimal bruising. Radiesse for the buttocks is a safe treatment, approved by the FDA as a facial filler in 2006, and regularly used for Instant BBLs. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Why Should You Pick a Non-Surgical BBL vs. a Surgical BBL? ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"A non-surgical butt lift, in comparison to a traditional BBL, might be a better alternative for someone who is looking for an improved appearance of their buttocks but is intimidated by the process of a surgical BBL. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-6","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Surgery Free","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Unlike a traditional BBL, an ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.lushfulaesthetics.com/body-aesthetic-services/lushful-instant-bbl/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Instant BBL","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":" has no surgical process attached to it. As previously mentioned, a non-surgical BBL requires only a local anesthetic in the area of injection. This means that you don’t have to go under anesthesia, and the procedure is much quicker, meaning you can go out and show off the new medical procedure sooner!","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-6","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"A Reasonable Price","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"While the price does depend on how many injections are used during the procedure, a traditional BBL is usually much more expensive than a non-surgical BBL, and BBL injection costs can be offset with the help of ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.lushfulaesthetics.com/financing/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"reasonable payment plans","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":". ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-6","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"A Shorter Recovery Time ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Traditional BBL recovery time can greatly restrict your activities and take anywhere from two to three months, depending on your body and the potential complications that may occur from surgery. blogPosts.title: Radiesse vs. Sculptra BBL
blogPosts.author: Lushful Team
blogPosts.intro: Compare Sculptra® vs. Radiesse® and see what is the best filler for buttocks, what are the side effects for each, and why Lushful Aesthetics, one of NYC’s leading LGBTQ+ MedSpas, uses Hyperdilute Radiesse for their Instant BBL.

article.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"NYC Radiesse vs. Sculptra: What’s the Difference?","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"When trying to determine what is the best filler for buttocks, it’s important to take into consideration the two more popular ways to get a big booty without surgery: Hyperdilute Radiesse or Sculptra. Each one can result in a more plump booty, but each filler for buttocks does have pros and cons attached to it, so which non-surgical BBL filler should you pick? ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"\nWhy Choose Non-Surgical Butt Lifts over a Traditional Brazilian Butt Lift?","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"A traditional BBL, or Brazilian Butt Lift, is a surgical procedure where fat is taken from areas such as the waist, thighs, and back to be used in the buttocks. The issue with a traditional butt lift is that it can be costly, can come with complications during or after surgery, and the recovery time is about 8 weeks. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Non-surgical BBL injections, such as those being used with Radiesse or Sculptra, in comparison, require no surgical procedures to still get the BBL results you are looking for. The recovery time is also, on average, around 72 hours, or 3 days, compared to the months of recovery time you can expect from having a traditional Brazilian Butt Lift. \n","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Not only is the recovery time for non-surgical buttock lifts shorter, but it can also be substantially more affordable, giving you back not only time to live your life but also saving you money.  ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"NYC Non-Surgical BBL: Pros and Cons of Sculptra vs. Radiesse for Butt Lifts","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Hyperdilute Radiesse is an FDA-approved dermal filler. It targets skin that might be sagging due to age-related volume loss. Containing calcium hydroxyapatite microspheres that blend into a gel, it is easily absorbable by the body to stimulate both collagen and elastin production. Collagen is essential for healthy skin, making tissue strong and resilient while withstanding stretching. The results of Radiesse for lifted buttocks are almost immediate, with smoother and firmer skin appearing after a few weeks. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Sculptra has a high poly-L-lactic acid (PLA) content that helps to boost collagen synthesis inside the tissue. In other words, it is a biostimulator that is injected below the dermal plane to volumeize the tissue via collagen induction. The issue is that Sculptra's side effects such as nodule and/or granuloma formation and tissue discoloration can be extremely difficult to correct. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"embedded-asset-block","data":{"target":{"metadata":{"tags":[],"concepts":[]},"sys":{"space":{"sys":{"type":"Link","linkType":"Space","id":"eh73f2j8s7u9"}},"id":"6nHZfZ0UGt1iCVrFvKgUVc","type":"Asset","createdAt":"2023-04-06T15:57:31.872Z","updatedAt":"2023-04-06T22:48:07.248Z","environment":{"sys":{"id":"master","type":"Link","linkType":"Environment"}},"publishedVersion":12,"revision":2,"locale":"en-US"},"fields":{"title":"Lushful Instant BBL Before and After","description":"hyperdilute Radiesse before and after, Radiesse filler for buttocks augmentation","file":{"url":"//images.ctfassets.net/eh73f2j8s7u9/6nHZfZ0UGt1iCVrFvKgUVc/b6b99fdb2b68d19a1fea3f1ed62b75bc/A3BA983D-8721-43EE-AC3C-CF54B39FE144.PNG","details":{"size":1447040,"image":{"width":1080,"height":1080}},"fileName":"A3BA983D-8721-43EE-AC3C-CF54B39FE144.PNG","contentType":"image/png"}}}},"content":[]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Lushful Aesthetics’ hyperdilute Radiesse before and after. Chris Bustamante (InjectorChris) treated this patient with 40 syringes of Radiesse filler for buttocks augmentation.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Why Does Lushful Aesthetic, NYC’s Leading LGBTQ+ MedSpa, Use Hyperdilute Radiesse for the Buttocks Lift?  ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"At Lushful Aesthetics, we use Hyperdilute Radiesse because we want to make sure our patients receive a long-lasting natural result. While Sculptra for BBL is still a legitimate procedure, we focus on providing optimal results, which is what Hyperdilute Radiesse delivers. Hyperdilute Radiesse induces types 1 and 3 collagen,  along with elastin, which provides the softest and most natural feeling result, while also helping to tighten skin and improve texture. Sculptra, on the other hand, produces types 1, 2, and 3 collagen. Type 2 collagen notably is fibrotic which typically results in a harder feeling butt. Type 2 collagen is also what is mainly responsible for many patients who receive Instant BBLs with Sculptra to be left with nodules or worse in some cases, granulomas. Because Sculptra also works on an inflammation cascade, it can leave behind an odd purplish hue discoloration in some patients. This is not seen when Hyperdilute Radiesse is utilized for ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.lushfulaesthetics.com/body-aesthetic-services/lushful-instant-bbl/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"instant BBLs","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":" because Radiesse doesn’t require triggering an inflammatory reaction from your body to produce collagen. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Patients are typically more satisfied with Hyperdilute Radiesse Buttlifts which can deliver results almost immediately, while Sculptra butt-lift results take about 3-6 months to complete the collagen induction process. There are also odd cases where some patients are considered “non-responders” and simply don’t produce any noticeable collagen induction months after being treated with Sculptra. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Lushful Aesthetics’s ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.lushfulaesthetics.com/body-aesthetic-services/lushful-instant-bbl/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Instant BBL with Hyperdilute Radiesse","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":" is about delivering an optimal and safe experience with non-surgical BBL results that will have you walking away satisfied with a lushful peach that will last for years to come. With an aesthetic clinic in Manhattan, Lushful offers a safe treatment for getting the results you are looking for.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

blogPosts.title: Top 5 Ways to Treat Butt Acne
blogPosts.author: Lushful Team
blogPosts.intro: Learn how to treat butt and back acne with a variety of remedies that can be easily added to your skincare routine, or can be conducted by a few appointments to a local MedSpa, such as body chemical peels or laser hair removal.

article.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"A Real Pain in the Butt.","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Tired of those little red bumps on your butt? Well, it’s important to find the root cause of your buttne. For some, it’s as simple as creating a butt skincare routine that focuses on exfoliation and moisturizing. While others will need further intervention.  Buttne treatment varies depending on the individual. \n","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-4","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Laser Hair Removal","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"For many (especially men), buttne stems from ingrown hairs and folliculitis. Unfortunately, this is often a chronic issue for many people with hair growth on their butt and the best course of action for eliminating the root cause is laser hair removal. Laser hair removal targets the root of the hair in the follicle to destroy that follicle from producing more hair. By eliminating the follicle, you’re preventing future breakouts that stem from folliculitis and ingrown hairs. It takes several treatments to see the final results of laser hair removal, but patients should expect to see improvement with every session. Laser hair removal is a great option for those looking to treat  butt and body acne, while also removing hair. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-4","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Using Benzoyl Peroxide ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"A well-known ingredient for dealing with body acne, it can be available over the counter in pharmacies in the form of gels, cleaners, or spot treatments. You can also get benzoyl peroxide in various concentrations depending on how severe your back and butt acne is. Benzoyl peroxide works by killing bacteria beneath the skin and works particularly well for inflammatory acne, traditionally characterized by red bumps containing pus. While some people can tolerate a higher concentration of benzoyl peroxide over another, it’s important to see what type of acne body wash works best for buttne treatment.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":" ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-4","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Daily Usage of Body Moisturizer ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Body moisturizer after a shower is another way to clear body acne, while also helping to prevent you from developing wrinkles and having dry skin. Contrary to popular belief, moisturizer will not make your skin greasy and oily, and may actually help to prevent buttne. This is because when your skin is dried out after a shower, your skin’s immediate response is to make more oil. If you have oily skin, it’s recommended to find a daily moisturizer that advertises that it’s either oil-free, non-comedogenic or won’t clog pores. Dermatologists recommend you apply moisturizer directly to your skin after you shower because it traps much-needed water in your skin and helps keep your skin fresh and soft. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-4","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Exfoliate in the Shower","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Another addition to your routine to help get fresher skin and potentially get rid of back and butt acne is to add exfoliation to your shower routine. Exfoliating your skin with an acne-fighting body scrub will result in your removing the top layer of dead skin cells that would otherwise continue to clog up your pores and cause acne. We recommend utilizing a body wash with either benzoyl peroxide if you have active buttne or salicylic acid if you’re trying to prevent future breakouts. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-4","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Body Chemical Peels ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"If you are dealing with more intense acne, or acne scars as well, ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.lushfulaesthetics.com/body-aesthetic-services/chemical-peels"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"full body and butt chemical peels","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":" are the gold standard for dealing with back and butt acne. Results from a medical grade peel, such as the Reve Peel can be fully appreciated 3-4 weeks after your treatment. Chris Bustamante, DNP, NP-C, will provide you with a full regimen to maintain your results from your body/butt chemical peel. ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.lushfulaesthetics.com/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Lushful Aesthetics","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":" specializes in many procedures ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"(from facial fillers to ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.lushfulaesthetics.com/sexual-enhancement-services/penis-filler/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"penis fillers","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":" at NYC and La Jolla, San Diego, locations) ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"addressing the aesthetic improvement of the butt with treatments such as Body/Butt Chemical Peels, Laser Hair Removal, Body/Butt Microneedling, and the ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.lushfulaesthetics.com/body-aesthetic-services/lushful-instant-bbl/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Lushful Instant BBL","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":".","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

ourApproach.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Like most dermal filler procedures, Lushful Aesthetic’s NYC-based liquid BBL procedure provides immediate non-surgical BBL results with the desired volume. At Lushful Aesthetics, a premier aesthetic clinic in NYC, we utilize hyperdilute Radiesse after an initial consultation to answer any questions about the instant BBL procedure and align on your goals for this procedure. Hyperdilute Radiesse for the buttocks is both a filler and a biostimulator, resulting in immediate volume and collagen stimulation. Radiesse® BBL treatments provide an immediate filling effect, creating natural-looking Brazilian Butt Lift results that last up to three years, while the collagen your body stimulates from the Radiesse can last over five years, resulting in a healthy lift to your buttocks.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

featuredServices.beforeAfterServiceDescription: Check out the remarkable transformations we’ve helped patients make in our non surgical BBL before and after video. Our Instant BBL procedure offers a significant butt lift providing an immediate increase in volume and a more defined profile without the need for surgery. The liquid butt lift before and after video demonstrates the benefits of a non surgical BBL, featuring a lifted appearance, overall size increase, and the smoothing out of asymmetries and cellulite. The before and after video also showcase how Lushful’s instant lift can be an alternative to hip dip filler with a seamless transition from butt to legs, ensuring a natural and enhanced silhouette.
