ourApproach.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Laser hair removal targets pigment within the root of the hair follicle, generating heat that damages the hair follicle and prevents hair from regrowing. Because laser hair removal technology targets pigment in the hair follicle, results are most evident for people with hair tones ranging from light brown to black. At Lushful Aesthetics we only utilize the gold standard in laser hair removal: the ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://www.cynosure.com/product/elite-iq/"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"value":"Cynosure EliteIQ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":". This machine is a dual wavelength YAG / Alexandrite system that is safe for all skin types.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"For optimal results, you will need 8-12 sessions to achieve significant reductions in hair growth. Treatment plans for laser hair removal will be customized based on the amount of hair at baseline, hair color, skin tone, pain tolerance, and personal schedule. The staff at our aethetic clinic will work with you to develop a plan that best suits your needs. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

preCare.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Shave the area 24-48 hours before your laser hair removal session.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Avoid tanning, including spray-on tans and tanning lotions. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Do not wax or sugar the area for one month before treatment.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Avoid medications that increase photosensitivity (i.e., antibiotics). ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Do not use any products that may increase your skin sensitivity for one week before treatment, such as Retinols, Salicylic Acid, Benzoyl Peroxide, Glycolic Acid, etc.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

postCare.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"After your session, it’s normal to see pinkish bumps. This will resolve on its own usually in a few hours, but can linger for 48 hours on some individuals. This is called follicular edema, it’s a sign of a very successful treatment.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Avoid sun exposure for one week.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Avoid friction and excessive heat to the treated area for at least 8 hours.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Do not exfoliate your skin or use products that may irritate for several days after.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Resume moisturizing the area to keep hydration levels optimal 24 hours post-treatment.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

featuredServices.metaDescription: We offer professional laser hair removal services in New York. From small areas to full body treatments, get long-lasting results with our cutting-edge technology.
featuredServices.metaTitle: Laser Hair Removal in New York City | Lushful Aesthetics

intro.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Trap botox, or TrapTox for the trapezius muscle, is an aesthetic clinic treatment designed to release tightness and tension that often results in stiffness, recurring tension headaches, and tech neck. From an aesthetic standpoint, TrapTox can create an elongated neck and leaner-looking shoulders.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

ourApproach.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"An aesthetic clinic’s Botox is injected into the trapezius to relax the muscle itself so it’s no longer able to contract as hard as it’s capable of during its natural state. This helps the muscle to release built up tension that may be contributing to discomfort and may also aesthetically be creating a more “bulky” looking trapezius.  With shoulder tension treatment, relief can last for about 3-4 months, then they will be due to repeat the process unless they’re also holistically working on other methods to improve their posture, stress levels and other factors that may have initially contributed to the tension that developed in their trapezius muscles. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

preCare.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Avoid alcohol consumption for 3 days prior to your trap botox procedure","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Consult with your medical provider, discontinue blood thinning medication such as Ibuprofen, Excedrin, Aspirin, Aleve, and Fish Oil a week prior to injections","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

postCare.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Avoid workouts for 24 hours post TrapTox","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Botox takes a full 2 weeks to be completely activated. Please allow the full 2 weeks before judging the result","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Though relief is often immediate, visible muscle “debulking” is evident around 6-8 weeks as the relaxed muscle diminishes its enlarged appearance.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
